projectDesc.p: "The Dream of Gong Yu" is part of The Global Medieval Sourcebook, a digital compendium of medieval texts in their original languages and in English translation. This larger project comprises computer-readable transcriptions and/or editions of texts dating from the ninth to the sixteenth century, and originating in Europe, North Africa, the Middle East, and Asia; accompanied by new English translations; high-resolution digital images of manuscript/early print sources, where available; an apparatus that includes critical introductions, textual notes and annotations; and a flexible user interface with which to navigate these materials.

editorialDecl.p: Transcriptions and translations are encoded in XML conforming to TEI (P5) guidelines. The original-language text is contained within <lem> tags and translations within <rdg> tags.
Abbreviations in the Old High German text are expanded, spelling and punctuation otherwise follow the manuscript.

interpretation.p: Texts are translated into modern English with maximum fidelity to the original text, except where it would impair comprehension or good style. Archaisms are preserved where they do not conflict with the aesthetic of the original text. Creative translation choices are marked and discussed in the critical notes.

rdg.s: There is a literatus from Tanzhou named Gong Yu.
In the winter of the fourth year of the Dao Qian reign,

lem.s: 與鄉里六七人偕赴省試.

rdg.s: he went with six or seven people from his hometown to participate in the provincial exam.
they paid their respects to the Yangshan Monastery and prayed for dreams.

lem.s: 輿夢至官府, 見柱上掲紙一片,

rdg.s: Gong Yu dreamt that he went into the government building and saw a piece of paper on the pillar of the building.

On the paper were the four characters: “Gong Yu Bu De” Meaning, “Gong Yu will not get it”
were written.
But the upper part and the lower part of the character “Ge” were not connected.

lem.s: 既覺, 殊不樂, 自意必下第.

rdg.s: When Gong Yu woke up, he was quite unhappy and thought he would fail the exam.

lem.s: 及春榜至, 輿中選, 餘人盡黜,

rdg.s: When the results came out in the spring, Gong Yu was selected and the rest of his group were rejected.

lem.s: 始以語人, 謂夢不驗.

rdg.s: Gong Yu began to tell people [what had happened], saying that the dream was not accurate.

lem.s: 好事者曰: “不字斷續如此, 乃一个也. 神言龔輿一个得耳, 豈不昭然?”

rdg.s: His acquaintances said: “When the character ‘Ge’ is disconnected like that, it should be read as two characters ‘Yi Ge.’ The deity was saying that only Gong Yu himself could do it, isn’t that obvious?”
